comment._content: Sam Schepps was a witness in the Becker case according to news reports. The Becker Case was the murder of a gambler, Rosenthal, by gangsters at behest of policeman Charles Becker. Schepps was thought to be the "paymaster" of the murderers, giving them the $100 bills that enabled them to get out of town. Here is article about his arrest: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9403E1DD1F3CE6... Here is citation about Becker en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Becker
